title: go tutorial 404
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Visit http://tip.golang.org/install/
2. Click at the link "Go Tutorial" under the section "What's next".

What is the expected output?
The link should point to http://tip.golang.org/doc/go_tutorial.html

What do you see instead?
404 message shown for http://tip.golang.org/install/go_tutorial.html

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
weekly.2012-02-14 +a9e12ba1c6ea
